effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains Special Attack effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Special Attack effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせると　素早さが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　特攻が
高く　育ちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s
Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon. Riduce la
Velocità nella lotta ma permette ai punti base
dell’Attacco Speciale di crescere più rapidamente.

Tabla de piedra que potencia los movimientos de
tipo Bicho. Debe llevarla un Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Erhöht bei Levelaufstieg
den Spezial-Angriffs-Wert, senkt aber die
Initiative.

Objet à tenir. Permet à l’Attaque Spéciale de
progresser plus vite, mais réduit la Vitesse
pendant le combat.

지니게 하면 스피드는 떨어지지만
여느 때보다 포켓몬의 특수공격을
올리면서 키우기가 쉽다.

もたせると　すばやさが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　とくこうが
たかく　そだちやすい。
